entry.title: Git tip - Count commits between tags
entry.content: Once every N commits I would like to release a new version of pwman3, so here is how to keep a track of this number between releases ... continue reading...

entry.title: Localizing applications with gettext
entry.content: I was always interested in how I can add translations to pwman3 or to my little PyGTK tutorial, these are summerizing of my gettext experiences continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 7
entry.content: Part 6 of this tutorial completed the Preferences dialog and introduced gtk.Frames and gtk.Expanders. This part of the tutorial will add some more polish to th UI, introducing icons and completing the About Dialog continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 6
entry.content: Part 5 of this tutorial added a gtk.Notebook and other widgets to the Preferences dialog. This part of the tutorial introduces the gtk.Frame and gtk.Expander widgets and completes the Preferences dialog. continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 5
entry.content: The last part of this tutorial added some polish to the main window of the CD Ripper, and showed how to create an empty Preferences dialog. This part of the tutorial will complete the Presences exploring gtk.Notebook and other widgets. continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 4
entry.content: The last part of this tutorial added the complete song list. However, the UI is still not complete. This part will add the polish to the UI. continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 3
entry.content: In part 1 of this tutorial, the most basic GUI form of a CD ripper application, was created. Part 2 then continued and expanded this tutorial with GTK ListView to create the song list. This part will add some polish and varnish to the UI as well as some more functionality... continue reading...

entry.title: PyGTK CD Ripper Tutorial - Part 2
entry.content: In part 1 of this tutorial, the most basic GUI form of a CD ripper application, was created. This part will expand this GUI and will add some more functionality ... continue reading...
